tour_page.guided_tour_description: Come explore the Universidade Autónoma de Lisboa through an interactive and historical tour!
tour_page.guided_tour_info_description: The guided tour allows you to explore interactively and engagingly the main spaces and history of the Universidade Autónoma de Lisboa. Throughout the tour, you will be guided through carefully selected stages that highlight important points of the institution, historical curiosities, and points of interest. This experience provides an enriching and educational way to discover each place at your own pace, allowing you to deepen your knowledge of our university in a dynamic and accessible way.

tour_scan_page.tour_end: The Guided Tour has ended. Thank you for using our application!

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.intro: The Universidade Autónoma de Lisboa values user privacy and is committed to protecting any information that may be shared during the use of the application: Autónoma GPS.
privacy_policy.section1_body: The Universidade Autónoma de Lisboa is the entity responsible for operating the Autónoma GPS application, an indoor navigation solution using BLE beacon technology to help users locate spaces and navigate the university campus. For any questions related to this policy, users can contact us at mmira@autonoma.pt.
privacy_policy.section2_body: The Autónoma GPS application does not collect, store, or share personal data from users. The information processed by the application is limited to detecting BLE beacon signals to calculate the user's approximate location in the space. No personal identification, such as name, email address, or phone number, is requested or stored.
privacy_policy.section3_body: The application uses beacon signals exclusively to provide navigation guidance inside the premises. The proximity data from the beacons are processed locally on the device and are only used to determine the user's approximate location and provide real-time navigation instructions. No information is stored or used for other purposes.
privacy_policy.section4_body: The application does not share any data with third parties. The processed beacon signals are used only on the user's device and are not sent to external servers or databases.
privacy_policy.section5_body: The application processes beacon signals locally, without the need to transmit sensitive data over the internet. If network access is required, communication will be protected by secure SSL/TLS protocols. Best security practices have also been implemented in the development of the application.
privacy_policy.section6_body: In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), users have the right to access, correct, or delete their personal data. However, as the Autónoma GPS application does not collect, store, or process identifiable personal data, requests related to accessing, correcting, or deleting data cannot be processed.
privacy_policy.section7_body: The Universidade Autónoma de Lisboa reserves the right to update this privacy policy whenever necessary to reflect changes in the application or in compliance with applicable legislation. The date of the last update is indicated at the top of this document.
privacy_policy.section8_body: For any questions related to this privacy policy or the functioning of the Autónoma GPS application, users can contact the Universidade Autónoma de Lisboa via email: mmira@autonoma.pt.
